review: Promised: Open world zombie survival game.Delivered: Battle royale as main game and survival is more like optional game-mode.Failed: To deal with cheaters.Also Regular Battle Royale is a joke. Most people keep teaming up and killing others.
Great game 10/10. A few bugs and glitches but nothing game breaking.Still in Early Access. But getting better with each update.
Best Early Access game purchase I have made. Having loads of fun playing it...
It's great fun to play with you friends in any mode... although competitive matchmaking needs to improve...
